thread.section_title: Hotel De Petris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect Location - Review
thread.title_full: Perfect Location - Review of Hotel De Petris, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Faye P
title: Perfect Location - Review
text:
Stayed here last summer - myself and boyfriend booked through BA and paid Â£129 x 3 nights room only (that price inc flights from London)
The hotel was very basic and quite dated but didn't expect alot for the price we paid and we hardly spent anytime there anywhere.
The staff were very very friendly and helped us if we had any questions throughout our stay.
There is a rooftop bar which is really lovely and we had a drink on there one night - the service was quite slow though which I didn't really understand as it wasn't very busy at all.
We were just a 5 minute walk away from the Trevi Fountain so the location is amazing - lots of bars & restaurants on the same street too.
